text: Vestey may refer to: *Vestey Group, a group of food production companies *Vestey baronets, two British baronetcies ==People with the surname== *Edmund Hoyle Vestey (1932–2007), English businessman *Sir Edmund Vestey, 1st Baronet (1866–1953), English businessman *Samuel Vestey, 3rd Baron Vestey (born 1941), English businessman *William Vestey, 1st Baron Vestey (1859–1940), English businessman
title: Vestey
